summary: Barbie is a famous fashion doll created by American businesswoman Ruth Handler in 1959. She was inspired by a German doll called Bild Lilli. Barbie is made by the company Mattel and has become one of the most popular toys worldwide. Over a billion Barbie dolls have been sold, and she has her own brand with clothes, accessories, and even movies and video games. Barbie and her friend Ken are known as the most popular dolls ever. Barbie influences social values by showing female independence and an upscale lifestyle.
title: Barbie
